Home

Add new task

  • Type task in the New Task textbox
  • Click Add botton to add task to the task list
  • Unfinshed tasks count will be displayed in task header

Complete a task

  • In the task list click on the check box to complete the task
  • Completed tasks will be stiked out in the display
  • Unfinished count will be reduces

Delete a task

  • In the task list click on the task
  • Options menu will be displayed
  • Select trash icon to delete the task from the list

Settings

Change Theme

  • Open setting page by clicking settings icon from the sidebar
  • select the available themes from the list to chnage the theme
